<Text: Best Of – LaFee:  The album was released on 27 November 2009 by Capitol Records and EMI.>

Triplets:<Best Of - LaFee
2:
--------------------
Text: Best Of – LaFee:  The release will be in two different editions, "Die Tag Edition" and "Die Nacht Edition".
Triplets:<Best Of – LaFee
3:
--------------------
Text: Best Of – LaFee:  "Die Tag Edition" will feature one CD of all singles as well some album tracks and b-sides.
Triplets:<Best Of – LaFee
4:
--------------------
Text: Best Of – LaFee:  While the "Die Nacht Edition" has a second CD which features the most of the remaining b-sides as well some more album tracks taken from both her English and German albums.
Triplets:<Best Of - LaFee
